modName: Remove All Spells v2 By Theo1996
summary: RemoveAllSpells v2 Will Save you from the psb cheat that gives all spells and shouts.
descriptionHtml:
The other version from another user is pretty much incomplete.so i decided i make it better i added almost every spell ecept the ones that are invisible to the command console.

Intructions:
Download put it in the same folder with your launcher.
Open skyrim when playing press the ` button under the esc nutton.
type \"bat RemoveAllSpells2\" without the the quotes.
Done.

Working On the other few Invisible spells.Wait for it.
author: Theo1996
